page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN COUNTESTHORPE
page.content:
Countesthorpe industry is mostly clothing,though there are other factories. These are the factories:
Monberrys-Childrens Wear,{G.B Tools, {Midland Design Ltd,} Goulds-Knitwear,{Economical Insulation {Kitchen and Bed Design, Maykens- Knitwear, {Castles joinery, Abbitex Hosiery,{Jacksons Printing, {Ashers hosiery, Bryad Print Finishing, {J.D. Marketing Ltd, Regency tights and stockings,
All these are factories that have been helping Countesthorpe's industry for many years.There is also Midland Design Company which makes hand made furniture.
